Posts.Content:
@Sherbear46: I would but would need a referral and everyone say's I'm just over reacting , . Argh. 
they classified my mamo/US as 3 on BI-RADS
Posts.Title: Stressed about results , wonder if I should get second opinion

Posts.Content:
Just 6 2015 
Had routine Mamo/US well I thought it was going, the US tech had very strange look on her face, stopped in middle of the exam and ran out the room saying ill be right back. 15 mins she came back did more imagining then looked at me and said , Nodule follow up in 6 months they booked me right on the spot
Few days later
Got a call from my clinic to review the results. the doc said we don't know what it is , you have nodule and you are all ready booked for your 6 months that was it.
 Now with Breast Cancer runs in our family on both sides ( aggressive BC -Grand Mother died Sister Year older a live and mother a live) ON my father said , His sister , mother and there mother had BC. 
So I requested my report and found out there was more then was shared. 
 U/S reports ..
Comparision study:
2007 - 2010
Findings:
Heterogeneously dense tissue is seen bilaterally and stable in appearance on MLO projections from the prior studies
On the right breast ultrasound a separated cyst is again seen at 2'o clock measuring 10 X 4 X 8 mm , 8 Cm from the nipple which is stable from prior study.
At the the 10-11 O'clock radian of the right breast 8cm from the nipple a hypoechoic area is identified with some blood flow measuring 7 X5 X 4 mm. this could represent a lymph node. nodule cannot be completely excluded.
At 2'O Clock Left Breast apocrine meteplasisa measuring 15 X 6 X 10 MM 4.6 cm from the Nipple. Other wise unremarkable.
Why didn't they just send me for Biposy? I'm totally stress and very worried that this can BC after my last brush of fear , Had Hysterectomy in 2005 at tender age of 25 for Endometriosis- pathology report show HGSIL CINIII that wasn't picked up on my pap
Posts.Title: Stressed about results , wonder if I should get second opinion
